mapper.select: SELECT parvialfield.id, parvialfield.NAME, parvialfield.address, a.trueName AS technicianUserName, b.trueName AS fieldlengthUserName, location.latitude, location.longitude FROM parvialfield, sec_user a, sec_user b, location WHERE parvialfield.technician_user = a.id AND parvialfield.fieldlength_user = b.id and location.obj_id=parvialfield.id and location.obj_type="zone" and parvialfield.disabled=0

SELECT parvialfield.id, parvialfield.NAME, parvialfield.address, parvialfield.technician_user, parvialfield.fieldlength_user, a.trueName AS technicianUserName, b.trueName AS fieldlengthUserName, location.longitude, location.latitude FROM parvialfield, sec_user a, sec_user b, location WHERE parvialfield.technician_user = a.id and location.obj_id=parvialfield.id and location.obj_type='zone' AND parvialfield.fieldlength_user = b.id AND parvialfield.id =#{id}
mapper.update: update parvialfield set name=#{name},address=#{address}, fieldlength_user=#{fieldlengthUser}, technician_user=#{technicianUser} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT p.id id, sec_user.id as technicianUser, sec_user.trueName as technicianUserName, p.NAME name, b.longitude longitude, b.latitude latitude, lot.id lId, lot.name lName, a.longitude as lng, a.latitude as lat FROM parvialfield p LEFT JOIN location b on b.obj_id = p.id AND b.obj_type = 'zone' left join sec_user on sec_user.id=p.technician_user LEFT JOIN lot ON p.id = lot.ssfc LEFT JOIN location a ON a.obj_id = lot.id AND a.obj_type = 'lot' where p.disabled=0
mapper.update: update parvialfield set disabled=1 where id=#{id}
